. O
BONN LOC

Germany LOC
's O

Ministry O
suggested O
on O

meat O
from O
British O
sheep O
until O

determine O
whether O

can O
be O

to O
the O
animals O
. O
" O
Until O
this O
is O
cleared O
up O
by O
the O
European O
Union O
's O
scientific O
panels O
- O
- O
and O

have O

to O

done O
as O

as O
possible O
- O
- O
( O
consumers O
) O
should O
if O
at O
all O
possible O
give O
preference O
to O
sheepmeat O
from O
other O
countries O
, O
" O
ministry O
official O
Werner O
Zwingmann O
told O
ZDF O
television O
. O
" O
I O
do O
not O
want O
to O
say O
that O
there O
is O
a O
concrete O
danger O
for O
consumers O
, O
" O
he O
added O
. O
" O
There O
are O
too O
many O
holes O
in O
what O
we O
know O
, O
and O
these O
must O
be O
filled O
very O
quickly O
. O
" O
Bonn LOC
has O
led O
efforts O
to O
ensure O
consumer O
protection O
tops O
the O
list O
of O
priorities O
in O
dealing O
with O
the O
mad O
cow O
crisis O
, O
which O
erupted O
in O
March O
when O
Britain LOC
acknowledged O
humans O
could O
contract O
a O
similar O
illness O
by O
eating O
contaminated O
beef O
. O
The O
European O
Commission O
agreed O
this O
month O
to O
rethink O
a O
proposal O
to O
ban O
the O
use O
of O
suspect O
sheep O
tissue O
after O
some O
EU ORG
veterinary O
experts O
questioned O
whether O
it O
was O
justified O
. O
EU ORG
Farm ORG
Commissioner O
Franz O
Fischler O
had O
proposed O
banning O
sheep O
brains O
, O
spleens O
and O
spinal O
cords O
from O
the O
human O
and O
animal O
food O
chains O
after O
reports O
from O
Britain LOC
and O
France LOC
that O
under O
laboratory O
conditions O
sheep O
could O
contract O
Bovine O
Spongiform O
Encephalopathy O
( O
BSE O
) O
- O
- O
mad O
cow O
disease O
. O
But O
some O
members O
of O
the O
EU ORG
's O
standing O
veterinary O
committee O
questioned O
whether O
the O
action O
was O
necessary O
given O
the O
slight O
risk O
to O
human O
health O
. O
The O
question O
is O
being O
studied O
separately O
by O
two O
EU ORG
scientific O
committees O
. O
Sheep O
have O
long O
been O
known O
to O
contract O
scrapie O
, O
a O
similar O
brain-wasting O
disease O
to O
BSE O
which O
is O
believed O
to O
have O
been O
transferred O
to O
cattle O
through O
feed O
containing O
animal O
waste O
. O
British O
officials O
say O
sheep O
meat O
is O
perfectly O
safe O
to O
eat O
. O
ZDF O
said O
Germany LOC
imported O
47 O
, O
600 O
sheep O
from O
Britain LOC
last O
year O
, O
nearly O
half O
of O
total O
imports O
. O
It O
brought O
in O
4 O
, O

- O

' O

. O
BALTIMORE LOC
1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
22 O
Baltimore LOC
Orioles ORG
manager O
Davey PER

against O

a O

- O
year-old O

was O

" O

is O

will O

this O

that O

to O

released O

. O

Andy O

the O
club O

this O
week O
after O

Angels O

John O

to O

Wednesday O

a O

clot O
in O

left O
calf O
. O

, O
who O
played O
eight O
seasons O
in O
Baltimore LOC
, O
was O
named O
Orioles ORG
manager O
in O
the O

. O

the O

last O

Measles O
exposure O
can O
lead O
to O
bowel O
disease O
- O
study O
. O
LONDON LOC
1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
23 O
Women O
who O
get O
measles O
while O
pregnant O
may O
have O
babies O
at O
higher O
risk O
of O
Crohn O
's O
disease O
, O
a O
debilitating O
bowel O
disorder O
, O
researchers O
said O
on O
Friday O
. O
Three O
out O
of O
four O
Swedish O
babies O
born O
to O
mothers O
who O
caught O
measles O
developed O
serious O
cases O
of O
Crohn O
's O
disease O
, O
the O
researchers O
said O
. O
Dr O
Andrew O
Wakefield LOC
of O
the O
Royal O
Free O
Hospital O
School O
of O
Medicine O
and O
colleagues O
screened O
25 O
, O
000 O
babies O
delivered O
at O
University O
Hospital O
, O
Uppsala LOC
, O
between O
1940 O
and O
1949 O
. O
Four O
of O
the O
mothers O
had O
measles O
while O
pregnant O
. O
" O
Three O
of O
the O
four O
children O
had O
Crohn O
's O
disease O
, O
" O
Wakefield LOC
's O
group O
wrote O
in O
the O
Lancet O
medical O
journal O
. O
Crohn O
's O
is O
an O
inflammation O
of O
the O
bowel O
that O
can O
sometimes O
require O
surgery O
. O
It O
causes O
diarrhoea O
, O
abdominal O
pain O
and O
weight O
loss O
. O
The O
researchers O
said O
the O
three O
children O
involved O
had O
especially O
severe O
cases O
. O
Exposure O
to O
viruses O
can O
often O
cause O
birth O
defects O
. O
Most O
notably O
, O
women O
who O
get O
rubella O
( O
German O
measles O
) O
have O
a O
high O
risk O
of O
a O
stillborn O
baby O
. O

Garlic O
pills O
do O
n't O
lower O
cholesterol O
, O
study O
finds O
. O
LONDON LOC
1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
22 O
Garlic O
pills O
may O
not O
lower O
blood O
cholesterol O
and O
studies O
that O
show O
they O
do O
may O
be O
flawed O
, O
British O
researchers O
have O
reported O
. O
A O
study O
by O
a O
team O
of O
doctors O
at O
Oxford LOC
University O
has O
found O
people O
with O
high O
blood O
cholesterol O
do O
not O
benefit O
significantly O
from O
taking O
garlic O
tablets O
. O
The O
study O
involved O
115 O
people O
with O
high O
blood O
cholesterol O
levels O
. O
They O
were O
given O
900 O
milligrams O
a O
day O
of O
dried O
garlic O
powder O
or O
placebo O
tablets O
. O
" O
There O
were O
no O
significant O
differences O
between O
the O
groups O
receiving O
garlic O
and O
placebo O
, O
" O
they O
wrote O
in O
the O
Journal O
of O
the O
Royal O
College O
of O
Physicians O
. O
Those O
taking O
part O
were O
told O
to O
eat O
a O
low-fat O
diet O
for O
six O
weeks O
before O
they O
started O
taking O
the O
pills O
, O
and O
their O
blood O
cholesterol O
measured O
before O
and O
after O
the O
six-week O
period O
. O
The O
researchers O
said O
this O
would O
make O
their O
findings O
more O
accurate O
. O
Several O
studies O
have O
found O
garlic O
pills O
can O
lower O
blood O
pressure O
and O
blood O
cholesterol O
. O
But O
the O
Oxford LOC
team O
disputed O
these O
findings O
and O
said O
either O
previous O
trials O
may O
have O
been O
interpreted O
incorrectly O
, O
those O
taking O
part O
were O
not O
given O
special O
diets O
beforehand O
or O
the O
duration O
of O
the O
studies O
may O
have O
been O
too O
short O
. O
The O
six-month O
trial O
was O
funded O
by O
the O
British O
Heart O
Foundation O
and O
Lichtwer O
Pharma O
GmbH O
, O
which O
makes O
Kwai O
brand O
garlic O
tablets O
. O
The O
study O
did O
not O
address O
whether O
whole O
garlic O
could O
affect O
cholesterol O
. O
- O
- O

Newsroom O

Malaysia LOC
bans O
nitrofuran O
usage O
in O
chicken O
feed O
. O
KUALA O
LUMPUR O
1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
22 O
Malaysia LOC
has O
banned O
the O
use O
of O
nitrofuran O
, O
an O
antibiotic O
, O
in O
chicken O
feed O
and O
veterinary O
applications O
because O
it O
believes O
the O
drug O
could O
cause O
cancer O
, O
the O
health O
ministry O
said O
on O
Thursday O
. O
" O
It O
is O
hoped O
that O
livestock O
breeders O
and O
feedmillers O
will O
abide O
by O
the O
laws O
and O
respect O
the O
cabinet O
decision O
in O
the O
interest O
of O
consumer O
safety O
, O
" O
Health O
Minister O
Chua O
Jui O
Meng PER
was O
quoted O
as O
saying O
by O
the O
national O
Bernama O
news O
agency O
. O
Chua O
said O
offenders O
could O
face O
a O
two-year O
prison O
sentence O
and O
a O
maximum O
fine O
of O
5 O
, O
000 O
ringgit O
( O
$ O
2000 O
) O
. O
" O
The O
ban O
takes O
effect O
immediately O
, O
" O
he O
added O
. O

Ukraine LOC
hails O
peace O
as O
marks O
five-year O
independence O
. O
Rostislav O
Khotin O
KIEV LOC
1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
23 O
Ukraine LOC
celebrates O
five O
years O
of O
independence O
from O
Kremlin O
rule O
on O
Saturday O
, O
hailing O
civil O
and O
inter-ethnic O
peace O
as O
its O
main O
post- O
Soviet O
achievement O
. O
Ukraine LOC
's O
declaration O
of O
independence O
in O
1991 O
, O
backed O
nine-to-one O
by O
a O
referendum O
in O
December O
of O
that O
year O
, O
effectively O
dealt O
a O
death O
blow O
to O
the O
Soviet O
empire O
and O
ended O
more O
than O
three O
centuries O
of O
rule O
from O
Moscow LOC
. O
Ukraine LOC
, O
with O
a O
Russian O
community O
of O
11 O
million O
people O
- O
- O
the O
world O
's O
largest O
outside O
Russia LOC
- O
- O
has O
avoided O
conflicts O
like O
those O
in O
Russia LOC
's O
Chechnya O
, O
neighbouring O
Moldova O
, O
and O
the O
former O
Soviet O
republics O
of O
Georgia LOC
, O
Azerbaijan LOC
and O
Tajikistan LOC
. O
" O
Ukraine LOC
's O
biggest O
achievements O
for O
five O
years O
are O
the O
preservation O
of O
civil O
peace O
and O
inter-ethnic O
harmony O
, O
" O
President O
Leonid O
Kuchma O
said O
in O
televised O
statement O
this O
week O
. O
" O
Unlike O
many O
other O
post- O
Soviet O
countries O
we O
were O
able O
to O
deal O
with O
conflict O
situations O
in O
a O
peaceful O
and O
civilised O
way O
. O
" O
But O
independence O
was O
initially O
accompanied O
by O
hyper-inflation O
and O
economic O
collapse O
, O
although O
there O
are O
signs O
of O
a O
turnaround O
. O
Inflation O
- O
- O
a O
hyper-inflationary O
10 O
, O
300 O
percent O
a O
year O
in O
1993 O
- O
- O
was O
a O
respectable O
0 O
. O
1 O
percent O
a O
month O
in O
June O
and O
July O
and O
the O
economy O
has O
just O
begun O
to O
grow O
. O
Kuchma O
told O
a O
solemn O
ceremony O
at O
the O
Ukraina O
Palace O
on O
Friday O
that O
" O
there O
was O
a O
turning O
point O
" O
in O
reforms O
and O
that O
he O
expected O
a O
rise O
in O
the O
standard O
of O
living O
in O
the O
near O
future O
. O
" O
There O
is O
no O
doubt O
that O
economic O
growth O
has O
already O
started O
, O
" O
said O
Adelbert O
Knobl O
, O
head O
of O
the O
International O
Monetary O
Fund O
's O
mission O
in O
Ukraine LOC
. O
" O
The O
national O
bank O
and O
the O
government O
have O
every O
reason O
to O
be O
proud O
of O
their O
efforts O
. O
" O
Central O
bank O
officials O
said O
on O
Thursday O
that O
a O
much-postponed O
hryvna O
currency O
would O
" O
definitely O
" O
be O
introduced O
before O
the O
end O
of O
this O
year O
. O
It O
will O
replace O
the O
interim O
karbovanets O
currency O
, O
which O
was O
introduced O
at O
par O
to O
the O
Russian O
rouble O
in O
1992 O
but O
now O
trades O
at O
almost O
33 O
karbovanets O
per O
rouble O
. O
Ukraine LOC
has O
repeatedly O
promised O
to O
introduce O
the O
hryvna O
but O
had O
to O
postpone O
the O
plans O
because O
of O
economic O
problems O
. O
Proud O
of O
its O
record O
in O
promptly O
joining O
both O
the O
Council O
of O
Europe LOC
and O
NATO ORG
's O
Partnership O
for O
Peace O
, O
Ukraine LOC
caused O
a O
foreign O
policy O
wrangle O
this O
week O
, O
offending O
China LOC
by O
allowing O
a O
Taiwanese O
minister O
to O
appear O
on O
a O
public O
, O
if O
unofficial O
visit O
. O

a O

by O

in O

. O
Kiev LOC
's O

Hennady O

said O

was O

. O
But O
Ukraine LOC
, O
seeing O
itself O
as O
a O

between O

and O
the O

countries O
of O

, O
is O
looking O
West O
as O

as O

. O
" O

of O
European O
integration O
should O
not O
in O
any O
way O
damage O
Ukraine LOC
's O

in O

. O
Relations O

, O
which O
is O

, O

, O
" O

. O
" O

on O

, O

. O

, O

. O

Russia LOC

. O

, O

61 O
. O
5 O
billion O
, O
she O
said O
. O
" O

cost O
of O

too O

, O
so O
the O

of O

in O

" O

" O

" O
. O

. O
" O

, O

worth O

" O

of O
) O

in O

. O

. O

Warner O

- O

. O

. O

SOCCER O
- O
DISAPPOINTING O
AJAX O
SLUMP O
2 O
- O
0 O
AT O
HEERENVEEN O
. O
AMSTERDAM LOC
1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
24 O
Dutch O
champions O
Ajax O
Amsterdam LOC
faltered O
in O
their O
second O
league O
match O
of O
the O
season O
on O
Saturday O
losing O
2 O
- O
0 O
away O
at O
Heerenveen O
. O
Ajax O
, O
who O
had O
a O
dismal O
series O
of O
pre-season O
results O
before O
beating O
NAC O
of O
Breda O
in O
their O
opening O
game O
, O
had O
the O
best O
of O
an O
entertaining O
first O
half O
but O
failed O
to O
break O
the O
deadlock O
. O
Eight O
minutes O
after O
the O
interval O
, O
Heerenveen O
's O
Romeo O
Wouden O
broke O
through O
the O
Amsterdam LOC
defence O
, O
left O
defender O
John O
Veldman O
standing O
and O
curled O
the O
ball O
beyond O
goalkeeper O
Edwin O
van O
der O
Sar O
into O
the O
Ajax O
net O
. O
Ajax O
, O
without O
injured O
defenders O
Marcio O
Santos LOC
and O
Winston O
Bogarde O
and O
strikers O
Jari O
Litmanen O
and O
Marc O
Overmars O
, O
then O
stepped O
up O
the O
pace O
and O
looked O
certain O
to O
equalise O
. O
But O
they O
left O
gaps O
at O
the O
back O
and O
on O
73 O
minutes O
Danish O
striker O
Jon O
Dahl O
Tomasson O
rushed O
out O
of O
his O
own O
half O
, O
beat O
the O
Ajax O
defence O
and O
lobbed O
van O
der O
Sar O
. O
The O
defeat O
means O
Ajax O
's O
main O
title O
contenders O
PSV O
Eindhoven LOC
, O
who O
beat O
the O
champions O
3 O
- O
0 O
in O
the O
traditional O
league O
curtain-raiser O
, O
can O
go O
three O
points O
clear O
of O
their O
rivals O
if O
they O
beat O
Groningen LOC
on O
Sunday O
. O

Adventurers O
start O
Canadian O
wilderness O
race O
. O
PEMBERTON O
, O
British O
Columbia O
1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
24 O
About O
350 O
adventurers O
from O
nine O
countries O
set O
out O
on O
Saturday O
to O
climb O
, O
raft O
, O
bike O
and O

in O
a O
323 O
- O
mile O
( O
517 O
- O
km O
) O
endurance O
race O
through O
the O
Canadian O
wilderness O
. O
The O
event O
, O
called O
the O
Eco- PER
Challenge O
, O
is O
part O
of O
a O
growing O
sport O
known O
as O
adventure O
racing O
in O
which O
competitors O
test O
their O
limits O
for O
days O
over O
a O
perilous O
wilderness O
course O
. O
" O
I O
'm O
looking O
forward O
to O
this O
race O
. O
I O
think O
it O
will O
be O
more O
physically O
challenging O
and O
we O
'll O
have O
to O
go O
up O
against O
more O
diverse O
situations O
due O
to O
the O
terrain O
, O
" O
said O
Dr O
. O
Michael O
Stroud O
, O
a O
veteran O
Eco- PER
Challenge O
participant O
. O
The O
Eco- PER
Challenge O
has O
been O
staged O
twice O
before O
- O
- O
in O
Utah LOC
and O
Maine LOC
last O
year O
- O
- O
and O
is O
modelled O
on O
similar O
races O
overseas O
. O
The O
70 O
teams O
in O
this O
year O
's O
race O
will O
will O
trek O
glaciers O
, O
climb O
mountains O
, O
whitewater O
raft O
, O
horseback O
ride O
, O
canoe O
and O
mountain O
bike O
along O
the O
grueling O
course O
. O
This O
year O
's O
race O
, O
the O
route O
of O
which O
was O
keep O
a O
secret O
until O
Friday O
evening O
, O
is O
being O
held O
near O
Pemberton O
, O
British O
Columbia O
, O
about O
100 O
miles O
( O
160 O
km O
) O
northeast O
of O
Vancouver LOC
. O
The O
area O
is O
filled O
with O

mountain O
peaks O
, O
ice O
fields O
and O
frigid O
waters O
. O
Organisers O
expect O

of O

to O

out O
or O

before O

. O
The O

are O

to O

the O
course O
in O
about O
six O
days O
, O
with O
first-place O

receiving O
$ O
10 O
, O
000 O
in O
prize O
money O
. O
In O
the O
Eco- PER
Challenge O
, O
competitors O
race O
in O
teams O
of O
five O
which O
must O

both O

and O

. O
Team O
members O
must O
remain O
within O
100 O
yards O
( O
metres O
) O
of O
each O
other O
at O
all O
times O
and O
finish O
together O
. O
With O
racers O
carrying O
about O
40 O
pounds O
( O
18 O
kg O
) O
of O
gear O
on O
their O
backs O
, O
broken O
bones O
, O

, O
dehydration O
and O
exhaustion O
are O
common O
. O

. O

. O

Zimbabwe LOC

. O
Emelia O

HARARE LOC

- O
24 O

of O

on O

which O

and O

. O
The O
Public O
Service O
Commission O
( O

) O
said O

that O
the O
workers O
- O
- O
including O

, O

, O

, O

. O
" O

" O

. O

. O

, O

. O

of O

country O

power O
, O
water O
and O
telephone O
services O
, O
disrupting O
air O
and O
rail O
traffic O
, O
and O
sweeping O
away O
houses O
and O
cars O
. O
Newspapers O
quoted O
witnesses O
as O
saying O
they O
had O
seen O
bodies O
floating O
in O
the O
streets O
. O
Among O
the O
dead O
were O
five O
members O
of O
the O
religious O
Jamaat-i- O
Islami O
party O
who O
drowned O
while O
trying O
to O
remove O
books O
from O
a O
basement O
library O
. O
They O
said O
thousands O
of O
people O
had O
been O
made O
homeless O
after O
a O
breach O
opened O
in O
the O
city O
canal O
, O
inundating O
residential O
areas O
. O
Army ORG
troops O
were O
called O
in O
to O
evacuate O
residents O
of O
low-lying O
areas O
to O
higher O
ground O
. O
Officials O
said O
the O
Ravi PER
and O
Chenab O
rivers O
, O
which O
both O
flow O
through O
Punjab LOC
, O
were O
in O
high O
flood O
and O
emergency O
services O
backed O
by O
troops O
were O
on O
full O
alert O
. O

Internet O
Startup O
funded O
to O
develop O
Java O
software O
. O
MOUNTAIN O
VIEW O
, O
Calif O
. O
1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
25 O
A O
small O
team O
of O
engineers O
from O
Sun O
Microsystems O
Inc O
. O
's O
JavaSoft O
unit O
said O
Sunday O
they O
have O
formed O
a O
new O
company O
, O
dubbed O
Internet O
Startup O
, O
to O
build O
Java O
infrastructure O
software O
. O
The O
fledgling O
company O
, O
established O
in O
a O
ground-floor O
office O
here O
over O
the O
last O
two O
weeks O
, O
has O
received O
venture O
financing O
from O
Bessemer O
Venture O
Partners O
of O
Menlo O
Park O
, O
Calif O
. O
. O
David O
Cowan O
, O
Internet O
Startup O
founder O
and O
acting O
chief O
executive O
, O
is O
a O
general O
partner O
of O
Bessemer O
. O
The O
startup O
company O
's O
acting O
chairman O
is O
Jim O
Bidzos O
, O
the O
president O
of O
RSA O
Data O
Security O
, O
a O
unit O
of O
Security O
Dynamics O
Technologies O
Inc O
. O
as O
well O
as O
chairman O
of O
VeriSign O
. O
Internet O
Startup O
, O
which O
opened O
its O
doors O
with O
about O
half O
a O
dozen O
initial O
employees O
, O
combines O
experience O
at O
JavaSoft O
, O
Apple O
Computer O
Inc O
. O
, O
and O
Oracle O
Systems O
. O
" O
Java O
portends O
dramatic O
changes O
in O
the O
way O
we O
use O
the O
Internet O
, O
" O
said O
Hong O
Bui O
, O
vice O
president O
of O
engineering O
of O
the O
new O
company O
after O
serving O
as O
a O
senior O
engineer O
at O
JavaSoft O
. O
Java O
is O
a O
computer O
programming O
language O
introduced O
by O
Sun O
Microsystems O
in O
mid-1995 O
which O
has O
immediately O
captured O
the O
attention O
of O
the O
industry O
for O
its O
ability O
to O
operate O
across O
virtually O
all O
computer O
system O
in O
a O
relatively O
secure O
manner O
. O
Just O
last O
week O
, O
Sun O
Microsystems O
and O
the O
Silicon O
Valley O
venture O
capital O
giant O
Kleiner O
Perkins O
Caufield O
& O
Byers O
said O
they O
had O
completed O
financing O
of O
a O
$ O
100 O
million O
fund O
managed O
by O
Kleiner O
Perkins O
to O
fund O
startups O
developing O
Java O
technologies O
. O
Java O
has O
been O
licensed O
by O
nearly O
50 O
organisations O
, O
ranging O
from O
Microsoft O
Corp O
. O
and O
International O
Business O
Machines O
Corp O
. O
to O
the O
Taiwan O
government O
. O
Prasad O
Wagle O
, O
another O
former O
senior O
JavaSoft O
engineer O
who O
is O
among O
the O
founding O
engineers O
at O
Internet O
Startup O
, O
said O
the O
new O
company O
aims O
to O
build O
software O
infrastructure O
using O
Java O
to O
make O
networked O
applications O
ubiquitious O
. O
One O
feature O
of O
the O
Java O
language O
is O
that O
small O
software O
programmes O
, O
known O
as O
" O
applets O
" O
because O
they O
are O
small O
applications O
, O
can O
be O
downloaded O
from O
the O
server O
computers O
at O
the O
centre O
of O
networks O
onto O
individual O
computers O
for O
use O
. O
In O
this O
model O
, O
individual O
computer O
users O
can O
always O
gain O
access O
to O
the O
latest O
programmes O
and O
do O
not O
need O
to O
store O
more O
software O
than O
they O
are O
currently O
using O
on O
their O
computers O
at O
any O
one O
time O
, O
also O
saving O
costs O
of O
memory O
and O
storage O
. O
Chris O
Zuleeg O
, O
a O
veteran O
of O
Apple O
and O
a O
former O
JavaSoft O
marketing O
manager O
, O
is O

at O
Internet O
Startup O
, O

, O

MOTORCYCLING O
- O
JAPANESE O
WIN O
BOTH O
ROUND O
NINE O
SUPERBIKE O
RACES O
. O
SUGO O
, O
Japan LOC
1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
25 O
Teenager O
Yuuichi O
Takeda O
, O
racing O
in O
only O
his O
first O
season O
, O
outclassed O
the O
big O
names O
to O
win O
the O
first O
race O
in O
round O
nine O
of O
the O
world O
superbike O
championship O
on O
Sunday O
. O
Takeda O
, O
18 O
, O
showed O
poise O
far O
beyond O
his O
years O
to O
overtake O
Australian O
Ducati O
rider O
Troy O
Corser O
, O
last O
year O
's O
championship O
runner-up O
, O
with O
four O
of O
the O
25 O
laps O
left O
. O
Honda ORG
's O
Takeda O
was O
pursued O
past O
Corser O
by O
the O
Yamaha ORG
duo O
of O
Noriyuki O
Haga O
and O
Wataru O
Yoshikawa O
with O
Haga O
briefly O
taking O
the O
lead O
in O
the O
final O
chicane O
on O
the O
last O
lap O
. O
But O
Takeda O
found O
one O
more O
spurt O
of O
power O
to O
just O
take O
the O
flag O
first O
with O
Haga O
second O
and O
Yoshikawa O
third O
. O
Haga O
had O
the O
consolation O
of O
recording O
the O
fastest O
lap O
at O
147 O
. O
159 O
kph O
. O
Corser O
, O
who O
crashed O
during O
practice O
on O
Friday O
, O
limped O
in O
fourth O
, O
four O
seconds O
behind O
Takeda O
with O
championship O
leader O
Aaron O
Slight O
of O
New O
Zealand O
11 O
seconds O
behind O
the O
winner O
. O

the O
second O
race O
, O

again O
challenged O
strongly O
until O
the O
fifth O
lap O
from O
the O
end O
when O
he O
crashed O
while O
running O
second O
to O
eventual O
race O
winner O
Takuma O
Aoki ORG
. O
Aoki ORG
, O

elder O
brother O
of O
reigning O
125cc O
world O
champion O

, O

was O

first O

, O

recorded O

fastest O
lap O
of O
147 O
. O
786 O
kph O
, O
and O
then O
by O

. O

out O
of O

race O
, O

not O

. O

rider O

third O
ahead O
of O

. O

by O

Japanese O

CRICKET PER
- O
RUN-OUT O
GIVES O
LEWIS PER
AND O
ENGLAND O
SLIM O
SATISFACTION O
. O
LONDON LOC
1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
25 O
Chris O
Lewis PER
did O
his O
best O
to O
forget O
his O
controversial O
omission O
from O
the O
England LOC
one-day O
squad O
on O
Sunday O
but O
could O
not O
prevent O
Pakistan LOC
reasserting O
their O
dominance O
in O
the O
final O
test O
at O
The O
Oval O
. O
A O
super O
piece O
of O
fielding O
by O
Lewis PER
, O
dropped O
as O
a O
disciplinary O
measure O
after O
arriving O
only O
35 O
minutes O
before O
the O
start O
on O
the O
fourth O
morning O
, O
provided O
the O
only O
bright O
spot O
for O
England LOC
as O
the O
touring O
team O
batted O
on O
to O
reach O
413 O
for O
five O
at O
the O
interval O
, O
a O
lead O
of O
87 O
. O
The O
solitary O
wicket O
to O
fall O
was O
Asif O
Mujtaba O
, O
run O
out O
for O
13 O
attempting O
a O
second O
run O
to O
third O
man O
where O
Lewis PER
was O
lurking O
with O
a O
point O
to O
prove O
. O
There O
seemed O
scant O
danger O
until O
the O
Surrey LOC
player O
swooped O
on O
to O
the O
ball O
and O
returned O
off O
balance O
to O
county O
team O
mate O
Alec O
Stewart O
who O
whipped O
off O
the O
bails O
. O
Lewis PER
, O
though O
, O
could O
not O
make O
similar O
waves O
with O
the O
ball O
as O

Malik O
and O
Wasim O
Akram O
batted O
through O

of O

. O

along O
to O
30 O
not O

was O

24 O

was O
again O

to O

role O
. O

BASEBALL O
- O
ORIOLES ORG
SNEAK O
PAST O
ANGELS O
. O
BALTIMORE LOC
1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
25 O
Rafael O
Palmeiro O
's O
two-out O
single O
in O
the O
sixth O
inning O
scored O
Roberto O
Alomar O
with O
the O
go-ahead O
run O
as O
the O
Baltimore O
Orioles ORG
rallied O
past O
the O
California LOC
Angels O
5 O
- O
4 O
and O
took O
over O
the O
American O
League O
's O
wild-card O
berth O
on O
Saturday O
. O
The O
Orioles ORG
trailed O
4 O
- O
3 O
when O
pinch-hitter O
Mike O
Devereaux O
led O
off O
the O
sixth O
with O
a O
triple O
against O
reliever O
Kyle O
Abbott ORG
( O
0 O
- O
1 O
) O
and O
scored O
the O
tying O
run O
on O
Alomar O
's O
single O
. O
After O
Brady O
Anderson O
sacrificed O
, O
Palmeiro O
hit O
the O
first O
pitch O
into O
right O
field O
for O
a O
single O
, O
scoring O
Alomar O
. O
In O
Boston LOC
, O
former O
Mariner O
Darren O
Bragg O
's O
first O
career O
grand O
slam O
in O
the O
sixth O
inning O
off O
reliever O
Randy O
Johnson O
lifted O
the O
Boston LOC
Red O
Sox O
to O
their O
fifth O
win O
in O
six O
games O
, O
a O
9 O
- O
5 O
victory O
over O
Seattle LOC
. O
" O
Just O
one O
of O
those O
things O
, O
I O
was O
just O
trying O
to O
make O
contact O
, O
" O
said O
Bragg O
. O
" O
The O
bases O
were O
loaded O
and O
I O
had O
two O
strikes O
. O
I O
was O
just O
trying O
to O
put O
the O
ball O
in O
play O
. O
I O
got O
the O
good O
part O
of O
the O
bat O
on O
it O
and O
it O
carried O
out O
. O
" O
In O
Cleveland LOC
, O

Seitzer O
's O
two-out O
single O
in O
the O
top O
of O
the O
10th O
brought O

as O

sent O

. O
Bob O

1 O
) O
, O

DUTCH O
CAPTAIN O
BLIND O
ENDS O
INTERNATIONAL O
CAREER O
. O
AMSTERDAM LOC
1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
25 O
Dutch O
soccer O
captain O
Danny O
Blind O
has O
decided O
to O
end O
his O
international O
career O
, O
Ajax ORG
spokesman O
David O
Endt O
said O
on O
Sunday O
. O
Endt O
told O
Dutch O
news O
agency O
ANP O
that O
Blind O
, O
35 O
, O
would O
no O
longer O
be O
available O
for O
selection O
for O
the O
national O
squad O
. O
The O
Ajax ORG
defender O
, O
who O
led O
the O
Netherlands O
into O
the O
quarter-finals O
at O
June O
's O
European O
championship O
finals O
in O
England LOC
, O
had O
decided O
to O
devote O
his O
attention O
to O
playing O
for O
his O
Amsterdam LOC
club O
, O
Endt O
said O
. O
Blind O
, O
who O
played O
in O
the O
1990 O

Cup O
and O
the O
1992 O
European O
championship O
, O
was O
capped O
42 O
times O
for O
the O
Netherlands O
. O

- O

. O

25 O

UNION O
- O

Advanced O

IVAC O

. O

Advanced O
Medical O
Inc O
. O

IVAC O

Inc O
. O
, O
a O
former O

Lilly O
& O
Co O
. O
unit O
, O
for O
about O

400 O
million O
in O

, O

one O
of O
the O
world O
's O
largest O

of O

therapy O
products O
. O

, O

and O

, O

. O
, O

. O

will O
have O

of O
$ O
353 O
million O
. O
Advanced O
Medical O
, O
through O

, O
is O
already O
one O
of O
the O
nation O
's O
largest O

and O

of O
intravenous O
infusion O
pumps O
and O

products O
. O
It O
has O

in O
38 O
foreign O

. O
San O
Diego-based O
IVAC O
is O
a O
major O
provider O
of O
infusion O
systems O
and O
related O
technologies O
to O
the O

. O

; O

. O

; O

. O

, O

- O

SWIMMING O
- O
POPOV O
IN O
` O
SERIOUS O
CONDITION O
' O
AFTER O
STABBING O
. O
MOSCOW LOC
1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
26 O
Russian O
double O
Olympic O
swimming O
champion O
Alexander O
Popov PER
was O
in O
a O
serious O
condition O
on O
Monday O
after O
being O
stabbed O
on O
a O
Moscow LOC
street O
. O
A O
doctor O
said O
it O
was O
too O
early O
to O
say O
whether O
Popov PER
, O
the O
only O
man O
to O
retain O
the O
Olympic O
50 O
and O
100 O
metres O
freestyle O
titles O
, O
would O
return O
to O
top-level O
sport O
. O
" O
His O
condition O
is O
serious O
, O
" O
said O
Rimma O
Maslova O
, O
deputy O
chief O
doctor O
of O
Hospital O
No O
31 O
in O
the O
Russian O
capital O
. O
" O
But O
he O
is O
conscious O
and O
is O
talking O
and O
smiling O
. O
" O
Maslova O
told O
Reuters ORG
she O
was O
not O
an O
expert O
in O
sports O
medicine O
, O
but O
said O
it O
was O
too O
early O
to O
judge O
Popov PER
's O
chances O
of O
returning O
to O
competitive O
swimming O
. O
Popov PER
, O
who O
won O
gold O
in O
the O
50 O
and O
100 O
metres O
freestyle O
at O
the O
recent O
Atlanta LOC
Olympics O
, O
was O
stabbed O
in O
the O
abdomen O
late O
on O
Saturday O
after O
an O
argument O
with O
a O
group O
of O
roadside O
watermelon O
sellers O
in O
south-west O
Moscow LOC
. O
Maslova O
said O
the O
wound O
had O
affected O
a O
lung O
and O
a O
kidney O
. O
Doctors O
operated O
on O
Popov PER
, O
24 O
, O
for O
three O
hours O
. O
Popov PER
told O
NTV O
television O
on O
Sunday O
he O
was O
in O
no O
danger O
and O
promised O
he O
would O
be O
back O
in O
the O
pool O
shortly O
. O
" O
There O
's O
no O
need O
to O
worry O
. O
We O
're O
going O
to O
be O
walking O
soon O
- O
- O
and O
swimming O
, O
" O
he O
insisted O
cheerfully O
from O
his O
bed O
in O
the O
intensive O
care O
unit O
. O
Interfax O
news O
agency O
said O
police O
had O
detained O
one O
of O
the O
attackers O
. O
It O
said O
the O
row O
started O
when O
Popov PER
and O
a O
group O
of O
his O
friends O
were O
returning O
from O
a O
party O
. O
Vitaly O
Smirnov O
, O
president O
of O
the O
Russian O
National O
Olympic O
Committee O
, O
said O
President O
Boris O
Yeltsin O
had O
given O
the O
swimmer O
Russia LOC
's O
top O
award O
for O
his O
Olympic O
performance O
. O
" O
I O
am O
not O
a O
doctor O
but O
I O
think O
he O
is O
doing O
all O
right O
, O
" O
said O
Smirnov O
. O
Smirnov O
said O
the O
Olympic O
Committee O
might O
ask O
the O
government O
to O
take O
measures O
to O
protect O
the O
country O
's O
best O

, O

already O

1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
26 O
Two O

Lamonts O
Apparel O
files O
reorganization O
plan O
. O
[ O
CORRECTED O
18 O
: O
00 O
GMT O
] O
KIRKLAND O
, O
Wash O
. O
1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
26 O
Lamonts O
Apparel O
Inc O
, O
an O
operator O
of O
42 O
family O
apparel O
stores O
in O
six O
northwestern O
states O
, O
said O
it O
has O
filed O
a O
reorganization O
plan O
in O
bankruptcy O
court O
in O
Seattle LOC
. O
( O
Corrects O
to O
make O
clear O
a O
reorganization O
plan O
has O
been O
filed O
) O
. O
The O
reorganization O
plan O
calls O
for O
all O
secured O
claims O
to O
be O
paid O
in O
full O
. O
Unsecured O
claims O
, O
including O
those O
of O
company O
bondholders O
, O
will O
be O
satisfied O
by O
issuing O
new O
common O
stock O
and O
warrants O
. O
Unsecured O
claims O
are O
estimated O
at O
about O
$ O
90 O
million O
. O
Lamonts O
said O
it O
plans O
to O
issue O
9 O
million O
shares O
of O
new O
common O
stock O
. O
Of O
that O
amount O
, O
4 O
. O
05 O
million O
and O
5 O
. O
67 O
million O
shares O
will O
be O
allocated O
to O
the O
company O
's O
trade O
creditors O
. O
Between O
4 O
. O
75 O
and O
3 O
. O
13 O
million O
shares O
will O
be O
allocated O
to O
bondholders O
and O
other O
unsecured O
non-trade O
creditors O
and O
200 O
, O
000 O
will O
be O
allocated O
to O
existing O
shareholders O
in O
exchange O
for O
all O
existing O
stock O
of O
the O
company O
. O
Bondholders O
and O
other O
unsecured O
non-trade O
creditors O
will O
receive O
warrants O
four O
about O
2 O
. O
2 O
million O
shares O
when O
the O
company O
's O
market O
capitalization O
reaches O
$ O
20 O
million O
. O
Bondholders O
, O
other O
unsecured O
non-trade O
creditors O
, O
and O
existing O
shareholders O
also O
will O
receive O
warrants O
entitling O
them O
to O
roughly O
800 O
, O
000 O
shares O
when O
the O
company O
's O
market O
capitalization O
reaches O
$ O
25 O
million O
. O
Management O
will O
receive O
options O
to O
purchase O
10 O
percent O
of O
the O
company O
's O
outstanding O
common O
stock O
with O
protection O
against O

at O
an O
option O
exercise O
price O
of O
$ O
1 O
million O
. O

CRICKET PER
- O
GOOCH O
TO O

. O

1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
27 O

Gooch O
, O

continue O
playing O

for O

least O
another O
season O
, O
his O
club O
Essex LOC
announced O
on O
Tuesday O
. O
Opener O
Gooch O
's O
decision O
comes O
towards O
the O
end O
of O
a O
season O
in O
which O
he O
has O
underlined O
his O
consistency O
by O
becoming O
the O
leading O

in O
Essex LOC
's O
history O
, O
beating O
Keith LOC
Fletcher O
's O
aggregate O
of O
29 O
, O
434 O
. O
Gooch O
, O
who O
retired O
from O
test O
cricket O
after O
the O
1994 O
- O
95 O
tour O
of O
Australia LOC
but O
is O
now O
an O
England LOC
selector O
, O
is O
seventh O
in O
this O
season O
's O
first-class O
averages O
with O
1 O
, O
429 O
runs O
at O
64 O
. O
95 O
, O
having O
hit O
five O
centuries O
and O
one O
double O
century O
. O

secretary-general O
manager O
Peter O
Edwards O
said O
: O
" O

is O
a O
remarkable O
batsman O
and O
still O

best O
in O
this O

. O

will O

just O

SOCCER O
- O
ROMANIA LOC
CLUB O
BOSS O
BANNED O
FOR O
HEADBUTT O
. O
BUCHAREST LOC
1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
27 O
The O
Romanian O
Soccer O
Federation O
has O
banned O
first O
division O
club O
Jiul O
Petrosani O
's O
president O
Miron O
Cozma O
for O
two O
years O
for O
headbutting O
a O
visiting O
team O
player O
, O
a O
federation O
statement O
said O
. O
Romania LOC
's O
soccer O
bosses O
also O
fined O
Cozma O
, O
a O
well-known O
miners O
' O
union O
leader O
, O
10 O
million O
lei O
( O
$ O
3000 O
) O
for O
the O
half-time O
attack O
on O
Dinamo O
Bucharest LOC
's O
Danut O
Lupu O
last O
Sunday O
. O
Miners O
led O
by O
Cozma O
rioted O
in O
Bucharest LOC
in O
1990 O
and O
1991 O
, O
bringing O
down O
the O
reformist O
government O
of O
premier O
Petre O
Roman O
. O
Cozma O
is O
awaiting O
trial O
for O
assault O
and O
criminal O
damage O
in O
a O
bar O
in O
his O
home O
town O
of O
Petrosan LOC
, O
300 O
kms O
west O
of O
Bucharest LOC
. O
The O
attack O
on O
Lupu O
came O
during O
a O
tunnel O
skirmish O
between O
opposing O
players O
as O
they O
left O
the O
field O
. O
" O
Cozma O
's O
blow O
was O
not O
too O
painful O
because O
I O
'm O
a O
tall O
man O
, O
" O
Lupu O
told O

on O

- O

. O

. O

, O
" O

, O

. O

produced O

testosterone O
levels O

. O

, O

' O

in O

. O

CYCLING O
- O
COLONNA O

Brazil LOC

. O

Brazil LOC
is O

to O

Paulo O
state O

daily O

said O
the O
Central O
Bank O
special O
administration O
of O
Banespa O
ends O
in O
December O
30 O
and O
after O
that O
the O
bank O
has O
to O
be O
liquidated O
or O
turned O
into O
a O
federal O
bank O
since O
there O

no O
conditions O
to O

to O
Sao O
Paulo O
state O
government O
. O
A O
Central O
Bank O
spokesman O
said O
he O
could O
not O
confirm O
or O

the O
report O
. O
Banespa O
has O
been O
under O
central O
bank O
special O
temporary O
administration O
since O
December O
1994 O
. O
The O
central O
bank O
management O
could O
be O
lifted O
if O
Sao O
Paulo O
state O
decided O
to O
take O
part O
in O
the O
recent O
federal O
government O
's O
plan O
to O
restructure O
state O
banks O
. O
Under O
the O
plan O
, O
the O
federal O
government O
would O
provide O
100 O
percent O
of O
the O
financing O
needed O
to O
restructure O
debt O
of O
state O
banks O
being O
privatized O
, O
liquidated O
or O
turned O
into O
development O
banks O
. O
It O
also O
offers O
to O
refinance O
up O
to O
50 O
percent O
of O
the O
debt O
held O
by O
state O
banks O
whose O
governments O
decide O
to O
keep O
control O
of O
their O
banks O
. O
Although O

plan O
was O
designed O
under O
terms O
proposed O
by O
Sao O
Paulo O
state O
governor O
Mario O
Covas O
, O
he O
has O
showed O
no O
interest O
in O
taking O
part O
in O
the O
plan O
because O
Sao O
Paulo O
's O
debt O

, O

who O

a O

at O

that O

. O
He O
was O

on O

in O

but O
failed O
to O

from O
surgery O
. O
The O
former O

, O
who O

from O
1971 O
to O

, O
was O

's O
famed O

, O

after O

. O
Lanusse O
took O

of O
the O
country O
after O
five O
years O
of O

. O

. O

to O

. O

a O

. O

" O

. O

. O

. O

SEC ORG
adopts O
rules O
to O
improve O
investor O
access O
to O
best O
stock O
prices O
. O
WASHINGTON LOC
1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
28 O
The O
Securities O
and O
Exchange O
Commission O
Wednesday O
approved O
rules O
designed O
to O
give O
stock O
market O
investors O
a O
better O
chance O
at O
getting O
the O
best O
price O
available O
for O
their O
orders O
. O
The O
so-called O
order O
handling O
rules O
, O
which O
were O
proposed O
last O
September O
, O
were O
approved O
in O
a O
4 O
- O
0 O
vote O
. O
The O
new O
rules O
will O
require O
specialists O
at O
stock O
exchanges O
and O
market O
makers O
on O
Nasdaq ORG
to O
allow O
customers O
to O
view O
price O
quotes O
from O
other O
electronic O
trading O
systems O
that O
may O
not O
be O
readily O
available O
to O
them O
. O
The O
rules O
will O
also O
require O
that O
customer O
limit O
orders O
be O
displayed O
with O
prices O
better O
than O
those O
available O
in O
quotes O
publicly O
available O
at O
the O
time O
. O
Specialists O
and O
market O
makers O
are O
companies O
or O
individuals O
recognised O
as O
qualified O
to O
maintain O
an O
orderly O
market O
in O
a O
stock O
. O
In O
a O
limit O
order O
, O
investors O
specify O
the O
price O
at O
which O
they O
are O
willing O
to O
buy O
or O
sell O
, O
as O
opposed O
to O
a O
market O
order O
executed O
at O
prevailing O
prices O
. O
" O
These O
rules O
are O
intended O
to O
empower O
all O
investors O
, O
by O
allowing O
their O
orders O
to O
compete O
on O
a O
level O
playing O
field O
, O
and O
by O
providing O
the O
disclosure O
they O
need O
to O
make O
informed O
decisions O
, O
" O
said O
SEC ORG
Chairman O
Arthur O
Levitt O
. O
The O
SEC ORG
's O
goal O
, O
he O
added O
, O
was O
to O
create O
" O
one O
system O
where O
one O
price O
could O
be O
available O
to O
everybody O
. O
" O
The O
director O
of O
the O
SEC ORG
's O
division O
of O
market O
regulation O
, O
Richard O
Lindsey O
, O
said O
Wall O
Street O
firms O
will O
probably O
need O
to O
spend O
about O
$ O
7 O
million O
to O
carry O
out O
the O
improvements O
called O
for O
by O
the O
new O
rules O
. O
In O
proposing O
the O
rules O
last O
year O
, O
the O
SEC ORG
noted O
that O
while O
technology O
has O
improved O
, O
commonplace O
practices O
still O
existed O
that O
worked O
against O
investors O
' O
best O
interests O
. O
It O
noted O
that O
customers O
whose O
orders O
were O
not O
displayed O
lost O
the O
chance O
of O
getting O
the O
best O
possible O
price O
available O
in O
the O
market O
. O
It O
also O
cited O
the O
potential O
problem O
of O
a O
two-tiered O
market O
in O
which O
market O
makers O
quote O
one O
price O
to O
public O
investors O
while O
quoting O
better O
prices O
in O
private O
systems O
, O
thus O
robbing O
investors O
without O
access O
to O
" O
hidden O
" O
quotes O
the O
benefit O
of O
the O
best O
available O
prices O
. O
Earlier O
this O
month O
, O
the O
SEC ORG
settled O
charges O
of O
alleged O
malpractices O
on O
Nasdaq ORG
when O
the O
parent O
of O
the O
Nasdaq ORG
market O
, O
the O
National O
Association O
of O
Securities O
Dealers O
, O
agreed O
to O
spend O
$ O
100 O
million O
over O
five O
years O
to O
upgrade O
its O
oversight O
of O
brokers O
' O
trading O
practices O
. O
The O
SEC ORG
dropped O
a O
third O
proposal O
that O
would O
have O
allowed O
investors O
with O
market O
orders O
to O

at O
a O
better O
price O
if O
there O
were O
shifts O
in O
prices O
before O
their O
orders O
were O
executed O
. O
The O
agency O
said O
it O
would O
monitor O
effects O
of O
the O
two O
new O
rules O
before O
considering O
the O
" O
price O
improvement O
" O
proposal O
again O
. O
The O
agency O
also O
proposed O
rule O
changes O
that O
would O
require O
continuous O
" O
bid O
" O
and O
" O
ask O
" O
quotations O
from O
exchange O
specialists O
and O
market O
makers O
who O
trade O
more O
than O
1 O
percent O
of O
a O
stock O
during O
any O
quarter O
on O
Nasdaq ORG
. O
The O
SEC ORG
's O
limit O
order O
display O
rule O
will O
mean O
a O
major O
change O
for O
Nasdaq ORG
, O
where O
such O
orders O
have O
never O

. O
The O

, O

' O

on O

, O

. O

. O

, O

, O

news O
agency O

. O

Saskatchewan LOC
Wheat O
Pool LOC
eyes O
hog O
market O
. O
WINNIPEG LOC
1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
28 O
Canada LOC
's O
largest O
grain O
handling O
firm O
said O
Wednesday O
it O
expects O
to O
forge O
a O
partnership O
with O
hog O
farmers O
by O
1997 O
with O
a O
view O
to O
expanding O
the O
company O
's O
scope O
into O
pork O
production O
. O
" O
Saskatchewan LOC
is O

positioned O
to O
take O
advantage O
of O
growing O
world O
markets O
for O
pork O
, O
" O

Pool LOC

. O

with O
hog O

shift O
in O
feed O

. O

likely O

to O

eastern O

than O
feed O
grains O

to O

may O

production O
systems O

provide O

units O

- O

nothing O

" O
Media O

that O
the O

, O
which O
is O

to O

of O
apartheid O
by O

, O

subpoena O
apartheid-era ORG
President O
P O
. O
W O
. O
Botha O

Basie O

. O

to O

National O
Party O
leader O
and O
former O
president O
F O
. O
W O
. O

's O

. O
Since O

work O
in O

the O
commission O
has O
been O
hearing O

from O
the O

of O
apartheid-era ORG
abuses O
, O
by O
both O

and O

. O

to O

from O
those O
who O

the O

, O

can O

. O

would O
come O

have O
faded O
but O
the O

to O

to O
appear O
. O

to O
give O
say O

. O
" O

of O
less O

10 O

, O

TURKISH O
AIRPLANE O
LANDS O
IN O
SOFIA LOC
ON O
BOMB O
THREAT O
. O
SOFIA LOC
1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
28 O
A O
Turkish O
airliner O
on O
flight O
from O
Istanbul LOC
to O
Vienna LOC
on O
Wednesday O
landed O
in O
emergency O
at O
Sofia LOC
airport O
after O
receiving O
a O
bomb O
threat O
, O
said O
an O
airport O
official O
. O
" O
The O
plane O
landed O
at O
Sofia LOC
airport O
at O
1503 O
( O
1203 O
GMT O
) O
after O
receiving O
a O
signal O
that O
there O
is O
an O
explosive O
on O
board O
, O
" O
the O
official O
, O
who O
declined O
to O
be O
named O
told O
Reuters ORG
. O
The O
plane O
, O
surrounded O
by O
11 O
fire-engines O
, O
is O
being O
checked O
for O
explosives O
at O
the O
moment O
. O
Nothing O
has O
been O
found O
so O
far O
, O
added O
the O
official O
. O
In O
March O
a O
Turkish O
Cypriot O
airliner O
hijacked O
while O
on O
a O
flight O
from O
northern O
Cyprus O
to O
Istanbul LOC
landed O
in O
Sofia LOC

MILTIADIS O
EVERT PER

. O

- O

28 O

( O
and O
) O

Miltiadis PER

. O

. O
Prime O

Costas O
Simitis O

package O
that O

and O

and O
's O

to O
over O
600 O
billion O

but O
and O

put O

much O
lower O
to O
about O
300 O
billion O

. O

blamed O
and O
for O

low O

of O
EU ORG

and O
said O

will O

' O

, O

and O

GDP O
growth O

Spanish O
tomato O
warriors O
paint O
the O
town O
red O
. O
BUNOL O
, O
Spain LOC
1996 O
- O
08 O
- O
28 O
Revellers O
painted O
the O
town O
red O
on O
Wednesday O
as O
the O
1996 O
edition O
of O
the O
world O
's O
biggest O
tomato O
fight O
began O
in O
the O
eastern O
Spanish O
village O
of O
Bunol LOC
. O
Thousands O
of O
people O
pelted O
each O
other O
with O
armfuls O
of O
ripe O
tomatoes O
as O
streets O
, O
walls O
and O
windows O
were O
coated O
in O
a O
blood-red O
wash O
. O
A O
single O
firework O
after O
midday O
signalled O
the O
start O
of O
the O
fruit-throwing O
frenzy O
, O
during O
which O
participants O
hurl O
some O
100 O
tonnes O
of O
tomatoes O
trucked O
in O
for O
the O
occasion O
. O
Local O
historians O
say O
the O
tradition O
began O
in O
1945 O
when O
disgruntled O
locals O
began O
spontaneously O
to O
bombard O
the O
priest O
and O
mayor O
at O
the O
annual O
fiesta O
in O
Bunol LOC
( O
pronounced O
Boo-nee- O
OL O
) O
. O
The O
festival O
's O
fame O
has O
grown O
and O
now O
attracts O
between O
15 O
, O
000 O
and O
20 O
, O
000 O
people O
, O
many O
of O
them O
foreigners O
. O

- O

for O

this O

muscular O
dystrophy O
disease O
had O
shown O
progress O
in O
laboratory O
animals O
. O
Word O
of O
the O
findings O
, O
to O
be O
published O
in O
the O
October O
. O
1 O
issue O
of O
the O
journal O
" O
Human O
Gene O
Therapy O
, O
" O
came O
in O
advance O
of O
the O
annual O
Jerry O
Lewis O
Labour O
Day O
weekend O
telethon O
to O
raise O
money O
for O
muscular O
dystrophy O
research O
. O
Several O
hurdles O
must O
be O
overcome O
before O
the O
method O
is O
used O
in O
human O
trials O
. O
Nevertheless O
, O
" O
a O
treatment O
based O
on O
the O
new O
strategy O
. O
. O
. O
. O
may O
have O
the O
potential O
to O
benefit O
many O
patients O
, O
" O
the O
University O
of O
Pennsylvania O
Medical O
Centre O
said O
in O
a O
release O
. O
Muscular O
dystrophy O
is O
a O
fatal O
illness O
in O
which O
the O
body O
's O
muscle O
tissue O
degenerates O
and O
is O
replaced O
by O
fat O
. O
Death O
strikes O
in O
early O
adulthood O
. O
Individuals O
with O
the O
disease O
have O
a O
non-working O
version O
of O
a O
gene O
responsible O
for O
producing O
a O
crucial O
muscle O
protein O
called O
dystrophin O
. O
In O
the O
study O
at O
the O
University O
's O
Institute O
for O
Human O
Gene O
Therapy O
, O
researchers O
altered O
a O
common-cold O
virus O
to O
carry O
a O
version O
of O
the O
working O
dystrophin O
gene O
. O
The O
virus O
, O
which O
also O
was O
altered O
to O
minimise O
its O
susceptibility O
to O
the O
immune O
system O
, O
was O
then O
injected O
into O
the O
muscle O
cells O
of O
mice O
bred O
to O
lack O
dystrophin O
genes O
. O
In O
the O
experiment O
, O
between O
30 O
to O
40 O
percent O
of O
the O
muscle O
fibers O
in O
one O
group O
of O
mice O
produced O
dystrophin O
for O
two O
weeks O
before O
diminishing O
. O
Similar O
results O
had O
been O
obtained O
previously O
in O
test-tube O
cell O
cultures O
, O
but O
not O
in O
live O
animals O
, O
the O
university O
said O
. O
The O
university O
said O
methods O
are O
still O
needed O
to O
make O
enough O
of O
the O
altered O
virus O
to O
treat O
humans O
, O
to O
further O
decrease O
the O
immune-system O
response O
to O
the O
virus O
, O
and O
to O
deliver O
the O
virus O
to O
human O
muscle O
tissue O
. O

. O

, O

said O
. O
" O

think O
there O
's O
probably O
a O

of O

" O

. O
The O

, O

years O
, O
will O
be O
handed O
back O
to O

on O
June O
30 O
next O
year O
. O

intends O
to O

territory O

first O

legislature O
because O
it O
opposes O

recent O

, O

. O

1 O
, O
000 O

, O
000 O

. O

, O

27 O
, O
000 O

, O

. O

, O
